# CMSampleBuffer.SampleProperties

**Structure**

Information about a sample in the sample buffer.

## Declaration

```swift
struct SampleProperties
```

## Overview

Each sample buffer holds a [doc://com.apple.coremedia/documentation/CoreMedia/CMSampleBuffer/SamplePropertiesCollection] which provides this sample information for each sample in the sample buffer.

## Initializers

- **init(size:timing:attachments:)**

## Instance Properties

- **attachments**: Attachments of the sample.
- **size**: Size in bytes of the sample.
- **timing**: Timing information of the sample.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype

items.description: Size in bytes of the sample.
items.name: size
